turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about The Witches and the Grinnygog (TV series).
turn.1: What is The Witches and the Grinnygog (TV series)?
turn.2: The Witches and the Grinnygog (TV series) The Witches and the Grinnygog is a British television serial that was first aired in 1983.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: The story was adapted from the book "The Witches and the Grinnygog" by Dorothy Edwards and was aired as a six-part television serial produced by Television South for ITV and subsequently re-broadcast in the US, Canada, New Zealand, and Israel.
turn.6: A strange statue (the Grinnygog), which fell off the back of a truck carrying stones of an old church for relocation, is discovered by a woman on her way home from the store.
turn.8: The woman takes the statue home and gives it to her elderly father as a garden ornament.
turn.10: The family who now has possession of the Grinnygog, in particular one small boy, begin to experience strange feelings of euphoria and a desire to participate in folk magic rituals.
turn.11: Is anyone else seen or heard anything else?
turn.12: At the same time, a nervous, "other-worldly" child begins to be seen around the town and appears lost and frightened. Meanwhile, three eccentric older women arrive in the town and appear to be searching for something.
